mapper.select: SELECT ro.role_id role_id,r.role_code role_code from users u JOIN user_organization uo ON u.user_id=uo.user_id JOIN organization o ON uo.org_id=o.org_id JOIN role_organization ro ON o.org_id=ro.org_id join roles r on r.role_id=ro.role_id WHERE u.user_id=#{userId} UNION SELECT rp.role_id role_id,r.role_code role_code from users u1 JOIN user_post up ON up.user_id=u1.user_id JOIN post p ON p.post_id=up.post_id JOIN role_post rp ON rp.post_id=p.post_id join roles r on r.role_id=rp.role_id WHERE u1.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT u.username username,u.cell_phone_number cell_phone_number,u.email email,r.role_name role_name,u.sex sex,u.is_super is_super from roles r JOIN role_organization ro on r.role_id=ro.role_id JOIN organization o ON ro.org_id=o.org_id JOIN user_organization uo ON uo.org_id=o.org_id JOIN users u ON uo.user_id=u.user_id WHERE r.role_id=#{roleId} UNION SELECT u1.username username,u1.cell_phone_number cell_phone_number,u1.email email,r1.role_name role_name,u1.sex sex,u1.is_super is_super from roles r1 JOIN role_post rp ON r1.role_id=rp.role_id JOIN post p ON p.post_id=rp.post_id JOIN user_post up ON up.post_id=p.post_id JOIN users u1 ON up.user_id=u1.user_id WHERE r1.role_id=#{roleId}
